subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Through the quirks of the N.F.L. postseason format, Carolina (7-8-1), as a division winner, will have home field advantage over the 11-5 Arizona Cardinals in Saturday’s wild-card matchup.
snippet: Through the quirks of the N.F.L. postseason format, Carolina (7-8-1), as a division winner, will have home field advantage over the 11-5 Arizona Cardinals in Saturday’s wild-card matchup.
